features: 54PCS Cloth Baby Wipes: It contain 54pcs cloth wipes, works great in baby’s daily life, perfect for cloth diapering, baby’s bath, or after meal cleanup.
Skin-friendly Baby Wipes: It is made of unbleached flannel material, which is soft, durable, super absorbent, and gentle on baby’s skin. Hypoallergenic, designed for sensitive skin.

Natural and Reusable: Its material makes it reusable for long-term use, and easy to clean (machine wash or hand wash), it also comes with a laundry bag, you can put them in the bag when using the machine to wash the cloth wipes.
Easy Organize with Wipes Dispenser: It comes with a blue wipes dispenser, allowing you put the cloth wipes in the dispenser to keep them clean, really convenient to store the baby wipes.

Baby Essentials: Perfect newborn baby essentials with high quality and safety material, can be used as baby face wipes / hand towels, washcloths for baby's shower, as well as essentials for diaper wipes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 54PCS Cloth Baby Wipes, the perfect companion for your baby's daily needs Designed for various applications such as cloth diapering, post-meal cleanup, or bath time, these wipes are a must-have for every parent. Our baby wipes are crafted from soft and durable flannel material, ensuring a gentle touch on your baby's delicate skin. With excellent absorbency, these wipes effortlessly clean up messes while keeping your little one comfortable and dry.

Versatile Use Use them as hand/face towels, washcloths for baby showers, or as an essential item for cloth diapering. With their high quality and safe materials, you can trust these wipes to meet your newborn baby's needs with care and comfort.

Easy Organize The Baby Wipes with Dispenser Organization is made effortless with our included wipes dispenser. This premium dispenser not only keeps the cloth wipes clean and easily accessible but also provides a convenient storage solution. Say goodbye to messy and disorganized wipes, and enjoy the hassle-free convenience of our wipes dispenser.

Easy to Clean One of the standout features of our wipes is their natural and reusable design. Made to be long-lasting, they can be easily cleaned through machine wash or hand wash. To simplify the washing process, we provide a convenient laundry bag for you to toss them in the machine with ease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These work MUCH better than disposables!
reviews.reviewText: These are such a great product. Sure, they're just squares of cloth - but they're well made, using soft and absorbent materials, stitched well, and include an actually usable storage box. We use these alongside the cloth diapers for our baby girl, born in October. They work so much better than the disposable variety, and they're far nicer on baby's skin. They're bigger than I had expected as well, performing double duty as a burp cloth, wash rag, you name it. If you're using cloth diapers, simply throw them in your wet bag and wash with the rest in a good detergent formulated to disinfect and clean well, and you have a system that will outlast most of your other baby products.Pro tip - keep a spray bottle with the re-usable storage container. then you can store them dry and clean, and give them a couple sprays prior to use. It's no more trouble than the disposables while being an eco-friendly alternative that's easy on your little one. One of those simple things that makes life way easier for new parents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY THIS! Soft and Planet Friendly
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommend!! Super soft and reusable. They wash up 100% clean white every time. These are much more durable, soft, and safe compared to pre-packaged wipes. The are larger and your finger will never poke through like disposables! We use a spray bottle with water and wet them before changing. Wonderful addition to a fully cloth diaper decision. With these soft cotton wipes and cloth diapering, we estimate that we will save $3,000 over our babies diapering lifetime and not send thousands of diapers and wipes to the landfill which do not biodegrade. The holder for these and way that you fold them makes them such a joy to use and clean baby much better than disposable wipes. Plus they are 100% pure because you use only water while disposable wipes all have some amount of toxic chemicals. Avoid scented wipes at all costs if you care about your babies long-term health. We can’t recommend this product enough!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for DIY babywipes!!!
reviews.reviewText: For the fact this includes not only 54 baby wipes, PLUS the wipe container itself and a little mesh bag, this can't be beat! I compared prices of other flannel wipes and honestly they were more expensive for less wipes and no container/bag.These are flannel, so don't expect hyper "baby soft" - I mean they're soft, but moreso sturdy and slightly thinner, with the feeling that they're going to hold up for a LOT of washes which is just what I was looking for. I've been using them for over a month and they've been working great! I just fold them as the video says, spray each one a couple times with my baby wipe solution, use them, and toss them in the laundry! Easy to clean and my baby's bottom is happy for using the natural solution :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wipes are well made and soft. They have cleaned well and don't hold odor. They don't fit folded in standard travel wipe bags and the wipe box that comes with it is terrible. The lid for the box doesn't snap on well. Over all we enjoy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thin, but definitely happy with them
reviews.reviewText: We got these thick thick grey ones for my first born that I can't find now, which were our favorite, and we mostly (me and my husband) called our poop wipes, cause how good, and thick they were, but these have been our second favorite love through 2 in cloth, and always better, grippier, while so soft, then posie wipes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not just for a baby
reviews.reviewText: I bought this so I can make homemade dryer sheets. Since my daughter had cancer I'm changing the way we live. I saw this idea on IG and loved it. It works so well. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars And now there’s 10
reviews.reviewText: My niece has had 10 children and each time she has a child there’s something new and exciting out for the children new gifts new gadgets whatever this was the most exciting thing that I ever seen it’s cool you reuse the old-fashioned wipes you can reuse these and clean them, and Use them again. Great idea saves lots of money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Container is useless
reviews.reviewText: The lid comes off every time you use it but the wipes are great!
Wipes feel very synthetic. Box is not good quality - lid comes off constantly.
